summary: At the beginning of the 20th century, there's no Poland. Russia occupies Warsaw. Herling, a fearless provocateur, is captured when a bomb he sets off kills two children. Although he's ... See full summary »
cast: Boguslaw Linda|Krzysztof Pieczynski|Danuta Stenka|Bartlomiej Topa|Adam Bauman|Andrzej Blumenfeld|Liubomiras Laucevicius|Aleksandr Peskov|Joanna Trzepiecinska|Henryk Bista|Georgiy Martirosyan|Oksana Chervyakova|Magdalena Hanitze|Monika Bolly|Andrzej Szenajch|Pawel Iwanicki|Slawomir Grzymkowski|Janusz Rafal Nowicki|Piotr Wawrzynczak|Pawel Nowisz|Jolanta Fraszynska|Edyta Olszówka|Marek Siudym|Marcin Jedrzejewski|Miroslaw Zbrojewicz|Jacek Lenartowicz|Jan Prochyra|Andrzej Srodzinski
title: Prowokator
